definitions.body: :1Ki 10:17, shield (Ar. mijan=un, Aram. [[מְגִנׇּא]], mgeno0)—[[מָגֵן]] Ge 15:1 + 33 t. (also cstr. De 33:29, Na 2:4); sf. [[מָגִנִּי]] Ps 7:11 + 5 t.; [[מָגִנֵּנוּ]] Ps 33:20 + 3 t.; [[מָגִנׇּם]] Ps 115:9, Ps 115:10, Ps 115:11; pl. [[מָגִנִּים]] 1Ki 10:17 + 6 t.; [[מָגִנּוֹת]] 2Ch 23:9; cstr. [[מָגִנֵּי]] 1Ki 14:26 + 4 t.; sf. [[מָגִנׇּיו]] Job 15:26; [[מָגִנֶּיהָ]] Ho 4:18; —shield, buckler, carried by warrior for defence Ju Jdg 5:8, 2Sa 1:21, 2Sa 1:21, 2Ki 19:32 = Is 37:33, 1Ch 5:18, 1Ch 14:7, 1Ch 17:17, 1Ch 23:9, 1Ch 26:14, 1Ch 32:5, Ne 4:10, Ps 76:4, Je 46:3, Je 46:9, Ez Eze 23:24, Eze 38:4, Eze 38:5, Eze 39:9, Na 2:4, Is 22:6 cf. Is 21:5 (anoint the shield, to make it slippery), so also Ps 35:2 (where ´[[י]] fig. as warrior); [[אִישׁ מָגֵן]] = armed man Pr 6:11, Pr 24:34; laid up for show, or as treasure 1Ki 10:17, 1Ki 10:17, 1Ki 14:26, 1Ki 14:27 (= 2Ch 9:16, 2Ch 9:16, 2Ch 12:9, 2Ch 12:10) 2Ch 32:27 cf. Ct So 4:4, Ez Eze 27:10; of scales of crocodile (leviathan) [[אֲפִיקֵי]] [[מָגִנִּים]] Job 41:7; fig. of wicked's defence against judgments of ´[[י]], [[עֲבִי גַבֵּי מָגִנׇּיו]] Job 15:26; fig, of king Ps 89:19 (cf. Che); fig. of rulers of Ephraim Ho 4:18; fig. of rulers of earth Ps 47:10; fig. (very often) of ´[[י]], as defence of his servants, Ps 3:4, Ps 7:11 (rd. ´[[מָגִנִּי עָלַי אל]] cf. Che crit. note) Ps 18:3, Ps 18:31, Ps 18:36 (= 2Sa 22:3, 2Sa 22:31, 2Sa 22:36) Ps 28:7, Ps 33:20, Ps 59:12, Ps 84:10, ; Ps 84:12, Ps 115:9, Ps 115:10, Ps 115:11, Ps 119:114, Ps 144:2, Pr 2:7, Pr 30:5, and v. esp. Ge 15:1 (E).
